response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150 to you. Considering its actual worth, I am offering it to you for $120. This is a great opportunity to acquire something truly special at a reasonable price. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 120}
